response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I understand its true worth to be $15,000. However, I am extending a special offer to you, aiming to make this opportunity more accessible. I propose to sell the product to you for $13,000. This price reflects a thoughtful balance between the product's value and my desire to facilitate a successful transaction. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations and aligns with your budget.", "product_price": 13000}
